item.description:
Saturday, July 21 - 10:30 AM - 5 PM

This event will help to raise funds forThe Thacher Island Association which is dedicated to the restoration andmaintenance of the Island. PRICE: $25 to register for this event.You must raise at least $75 in donations towards the Thacher Island Association to receive a gift bag.

DONATED PRIZES RANGING FROM $25 - $250 GIFT CERTIFICATES WILL BE AWARDED TO THE PARTICIPANTS WHO RAISE THE MOST MONEY FOR THIS CHARITY EVENT.

REGISTRATION AND LAUNCH POINT WILLBE HELD AT GRANITE PIER, ROCKPORT.

Since you will be paddling from Rockport Harbor to Thatcher Island and back, it is expected that you or your guests be pretty good kayakers as you will be kayaking in the ice cold water off Rockport Harbor... (Have you ever been to the beach in Rockport? - The water is cold - even in August!)

You and your guest must wear a PFD. You can bring your own kayak or rent one there.

For details and to register- please go to

http:\\www.thacherislandpaddle.com

Then come back here to rsvp on the meetup.

We'll probably get something to eat around Bearskin Neck in Rockport afterwards.

Questions? Feel free to contact me...

Regards,

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Michele at the Rockport Grantite Pier
item.name: Thacher Island - Kayakathon! Kayak for a cause!
